changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE PAYMENT ( ID INT8 NOT NULL, ORDER_REFERENCE VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PAYMENT_REFERENCE VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, AMOUNT NUMERIC(38, 2) NOT NULL, PAYMENT_METHOD VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, SUCCESS BOOL NOT NULL, CREATED_BY INT8, LAST_MODIFIED_BY INT8, CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP(6) DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, DELETED_AT TIMESTAMP(6), DELETED_BY INT8, LAST_MODIFIED_AT TIMESTAMP(6), CONSTRAINT PAYMENT_ID_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (ID) );
